document.full_text: sergio mitre went to the brewers for a minor league outfielder, ensuring that ivan nova, freddy garcia and bartolo colon will make the opening day roster. kevin millwood will start in class aaa.
document.title: analysis: yankees collect arms and trust in the market
lines_and_colors: sergio mitre went to the brewers for a minor league outfielder, ensuring that ivan nova, freddy garcia and bartolo colon will make the opening day roster. kevin millwood will start in class aaa.
